explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses the application of deep learning methods in cryptocurrency research, which is a subset of machine learning.
explanations.reinforcement learning: The abstract mentions deep reinforcement learning as one of the methods reviewed.
explanations.deep learning: The paper is a survey of deep learning applications in cryptocurrency, explicitly mentioning deep learning methods.
explanations.neural network: Deep learning models are based on neural networks, and the paper reviews several neural network architectures.
explanations.representation learning: Deep learning inherently involves representation learning, as it learns hierarchical representations of data.
explanations.convolutional neural network: The abstract lists convolutional neural networks as one of the deep learning models reviewed.
explanations.CNN: CNN is an abbreviation for convolutional neural network, which is mentioned in the abstract.
explanations.recurrent neural network: The abstract lists recurrent neural networks as one of the deep learning models reviewed.
explanations.long short-term memory: LSTM is a type of recurrent neural network, which is likely included in the review of RNNs.
explanations.LSTM: LSTM is a type of recurrent neural network, which is likely included in the review of RNNs.
explanations.deep belief network: The abstract lists deep belief networks as one of the deep learning models reviewed.
explanations.DBM: DBM (Deep Boltzmann Machine) is related to deep belief networks, which are mentioned in the abstract.
